channel.title: Hpc on The ML Surgeon
channel.description: Recent content in Hpc on The ML Surgeon

item.title: Comms
item.description: During my Master’s degree in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning at the University of Pisa, I took a variety of courses. These ranged from highly specialized subjects (machine learning, human language technologies, systems for pattern recognition) to more foundational ones (algorithm engineering, information retrieval, computational mathematics).
